sentences.sentence: Chuck: I have to say I prefer the chestnut pappardelle.
sentences.translation: 我不得不说我更喜欢栗子味的宽面条。

sentences.sentence: Pappardelle With Greens and Ricotta: This pasta is ideal for a dinner party when there is little time to prepare. Just be sure to use fresh ricotta.
sentences.translation: 意式芝士蔬菜宽面：这道意大利面特别适合在家开派对而没有充足时间准备美食的人。注意芝士一定要用新鲜的。
